message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you at a price of $20,000. I believe it offers significant value, and this price reflects its worth in the market.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $15,000 for it. Would you be able to meet me at that price?
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $15,000 is below its true value. How about we meet in the middle at $18,000?

Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. While I understand the value of the product, I am still unable to go above $15,000. Would it be possible for us to reach an agreement at this price?
